name: virtual-code-owners
description: merges a VIRTUAL-CODEOWNERS and a virtual-teams.yml into CODEOWNERS

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && node tools/get-version.mjs > src/version.ts && tsc
scripts.depcruise:graph: depcruise src --include-only '^(src)' --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > dependency-graph.html
scripts.depcruise:graph:dev: depcruise src --include-only '^(src)' --prefix vscode://file/$(pwd)/ --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html | browser
scripts.update-dependencies: npm run upem:update && npm run upem:install && npm run format && npm run build && npm test
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run scm:stage

author: Sander Verweij (https://sverweij.github.io/)
